bibl.title: Violence and Aggression in the Ancient World
bibl.note: Paper from a conference held September 15-17, 2005, Cracow. Uses the archaeological and epigraphical evidence from Kom el-Dikka (in part. graffiti) to study street violence in Roman and early Byzantine Alexandria. - Non vidimus.
Jerzy STYKA (ed.), Violence and Aggression in the Ancient World = Classica Cracoviensia. 10 (Krak√≥w, 2006) pp. 117-126.
